channel.title: Usage descriptions of the Functions in Functionlist
channel.description:
Hi, I am just starting out with SIMBA.
I am reviewing other peoples scripts to learn how they did things. I have come across several functions that I do not understand and there seems to be no documentation. My programming skills are for 8 and 16 micros using basic C and assembly.
For example I want to know what the Math Function "FLOOR" does but even more importantly where can I find the documentation for the functions in the FUNCTIONLIST?
Thank you

item.title: Usage descriptions of the Functions in Functionlist
item.dc:creator: @Echo3 Echo_
item.description:
@Echo3 wrote:

Documentation is here:
http://docs.villavu.com/simba/index.html

And floor rounds an extended value down.

var
  E: Extended;
begin
  E := 1.5;
  //Prints 1
  WriteLn(IntToStr(Floor(E)));
end.

Read full topic
item.source: Usage descriptions of the Functions in Functionlist
